name: Aji Charapita Pepper
description: A tiny, fiery pepper known as the 'mother of all peppers' in Peru, used for its intense heat and citrusy flavor.

name: Aji Fantasy Pepper
description: A mild, fruity pepper with a sweet and citrusy flavor, commonly grown in Finland.

name: Black Panther Orange Pepper
description: A rare, visually striking pepper with a sweet, fruity flavor and medium heat.

name: Buena Mulata Pepper
description: A beautiful, vibrant purple cayenne-type pepper that turns red when mature, with a medium heat.

name: Candy Cane Pepper
description: A variegated sweet pepper with stripes, providing a crunchy, sweet taste.

name: Death Spiral Pepper
description: A wickedly hot pepper with a bumpy texture and extreme heat, originating from the UK.

name: Fish Pepper
description: An heirloom pepper with striking variegated foliage and a moderate heat level, historically used in seafood dishes.

name: Habanero Mustard Pepper
description: A mustard-colored habanero pepper with a fruity, tropical flavor and intense heat.

name: Hatch Green Chile Pepper
description: A popular New Mexican pepper known for its mild heat and earthy flavor.

name: Jay's Peach Ghost Scorpion Pepper
description: A super-hot pepper with a unique peach color and an extreme fiery heat level.

name: Jimmy Nardello Pepper
description: A sweet, thin-skinned pepper often used for frying, with a mild, sweet taste.

name: Lesya Pepper
description: A Ukrainian heirloom sweet pepper with a robust, rich flavor and no heat.

name: MOA Scotch Bonnet Pepper
description: A Caribbean hot pepper with a fruity flavor and intense heat, perfect for jerk seasoning.

name: Olive Nagabrains Pepper
description: A super-hot pepper with an olive-green hue and a fruity flavor, extremely rare.

name: Paradeisfruchtiger Pepper
description: A sweet and tangy pepper from Austria, often used in salads and fresh dishes.

name: Pimenta Da Neyde Pepper
description: A striking, dark purple pepper with a smoky, fruity flavor and high heat.

name: Purple Beauty Bell Pepper
description: A stunning, deep purple bell pepper with a sweet, mild flavor and no heat.

name: Purple Reaper Pepper
description: A purple variant of the Carolina Reaper, known for its intense heat and unique color.

name: Snow White SLP Pepper
description: A creamy, white pepper with a mild heat and a sweet, fruity flavor.

name: Sugar Rush Stripey Pepper
description: A sweet and fruity pepper with unique yellow and red striping and moderate heat.

name: Trinidad Moruga Scorpion Pepper
description: One of the hottest peppers in the world, with a fruity flavor and intense heat.
